opportunities.title: AI/ML Development Platforms
opportunities.description: Mid-market ($200-600/mo) underserved (Opportunity score: 92/100, $299-$599/mo (3-5 tiers from $299 to $599))

gap_indicators: Massive price jump from hobbyist to enterprise (10x+)
Mid-market companies struggle with DIY solutions
Growing AI adoption in non-tech companies
Lack of managed AI infrastructure for SMBs
target_customers: Series A-B startups building AI features
SaaS companies adding AI to existing products
raw_data.competitive_weakness: Enterprise players focus on Fortune 500, indie tools lack reliability/scale
value_props_needed: Simple API for common AI tasks

opportunities.title: No-Code Automation Tools
opportunities.description: Growing teams ($75-250/mo) need more power without enterprise complexity (Opportunity score: 88/100, $149-$399/mo (unlimited tasks, tiered by integrations))

raw_data.identified_gap: Growing teams ($75-250/mo) need more power without enterprise complexity
gap_indicators: Zapier pricing jumps quickly with task volume
Power users hit limits on starter plans
Growing teams need custom integrations
Developer-friendly alternatives underpriced
raw_data.competitive_weakness: Leaders charge per-task, creating unpredictable costs

opportunities.title: API Development & Testing
opportunities.description: Professional tier ($150-400/mo) missing for growing API-first companies (Opportunity score: 85/100, $199-$449/mo (tiered by team size and API requests))

raw_data.identified_gap: Professional tier ($150-400/mo) missing for growing API-first companies
gap_indicators: Free tiers too limited for serious use
Enterprise tiers over-featured for growing companies
API economy growing rapidly
Developer tools market expanding
raw_data.competitive_weakness: Postman focuses on testing, lacks full lifecycle management
raw_data.recommended_pricing: $199-$449/mo (tiered by team size and API requests)

opportunities.title: Customer Data Platforms
opportunities.description: Mid-market CDP ($400-1200/mo) with simpler setup needed (Opportunity score: 83/100, $499-$999/mo (tiered by MTU: 100K, 250K, 500K))

raw_data.identified_gap: Mid-market CDP ($400-1200/mo) with simpler setup needed
gap_indicators: Enterprise CDPs have 6-12 month implementations
Mid-market needs simpler setup and maintenance
Data warehouse complexity barrier
Privacy regulations driving demand
raw_data.competitive_weakness: Segment/mParticle expensive, Rudderstack requires technical setup
value_props_needed: Simple visual interface for non-technical users

opportunities.title: Internal Tools Builders
opportunities.description: Growing startups ($150-500/mo) need more than basic but not enterprise (Opportunity score: 80/100, $199-$499/mo (tiered by apps and users: 5/10/25 apps))

raw_data.identified_gap: Growing startups ($150-500/mo) need more than basic but not enterprise
gap_indicators: Retool dominates but expensive for smaller teams
Many companies still using spreadsheets
Remote work increasing need for internal tools
No-code movement reducing technical barriers
target_customers: Customer success teams building client portals
raw_data.competitive_weakness: Retool priced for engineering teams, not business users
value_props_needed: Template library for common use cases
No-code first with code escape hatch
